title: Love's Wicked Game: A Provocative, Persuasive Story of Love, Lust and Money
description: Love's Wicked Game is a classic tale of love, lust, money, and murder. The story features Helen Dougherty, a.k.a., the other woman. Helen is obsessed with real estate mogul, Brad Williamson, and will stop at nothing to take him away from his perfect wife, Claire. Helen was a past acquaintance from Brad’s high school days. Using her knowledge of his current success, Helen uses her own financial misfortune along with a good deal of bewitching sexuality to “charm” her way back into Brad’s life. Follow along to find out who comes out on top in this raging battle between wild sexual desire and true love.
author: Eddie   Johnson
